description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, especially the most vulnerable, including girls and those in humanitarian situations, are protected from violence, abuse, exploitation and child marriage within their families and communities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
